name: ColorShape - Endless reflex game
description:
Swipe left. Swipe right. Catch symbols with same color, same shape or both. Catch as many symbols as possible to break records! How far can you go?

Easy to play. Hard to master.

ColorShape is an addictive family game with a simple goal: catch symbols by matching its color, its shape or both.

It will be a tough and addictive challenge for your brain.
A piece of advice: be quick and sharp to beat the best scores of your friends!

Do you think you’re fast enough?
It’s time to find out and test your reflexes!

Download now for FREE!

Game features:
◉ Endless gameplay
◉ Swipe-based control
◉ Collectible coins
◉ Earn GameCenter achievements
◉ Break records on GameCenter leaderboard
◉ Unlockable animated trails to customise your endless race
◉ Offline friendly

Crafted with love under the sun of Montpellier and the freshness of French Alps by Pixel Rocket game studio.
